name: Stralian Shadows
description:
While driving in the Australian bush, Jose runs out of fuel and needs to walk to the petrol station.

A challenging side-scroller, with restrictive inventory and aggressive enemies.

This was a game jam entry

Please keep in mind this was for a game jam with limited time, so we had to skimp on a few things we really wanted to do, such as sound effects, music, animations, more weapons and enemies.

Credits and Assets

The idea, design, code, and graphics were created from scratch by gak (g4k0) and jart for the game jam. gak created the idea and code. jart made all of the awesome graphics.

The only asset that was not ours are the cricket/bush background sound loop, which is public domain: https://soundbible.com/2083-Crickets-Chirping-At-Night.html
